import './index.scss'; import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import LogoS from '../../assets/images/logo-s1.png'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faEnvelope, faHome, faUser } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { faGithub, faInstagram, faLinkedin, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; const Sidebar = () => { return (
setShowNav(false)} > setShowNav(false)} > setShowNav(false)} > setShowNav(false)} > setShowNav(false)} icon={faClose} color="#ffd700" size="3x" className="close-icon" />
); }; export default Sidebar;
